data.name: M3_Detail

data.name: 新編_第二一戦隊_出撃準備

data.value: Sortie Nachi(Kai-2), Ashigara(Kai-2), Tama, Kiso and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

data.name: 機動部隊の運用を強化せよ

data.name: 第五航空戦隊_を再編成せよ

data.name: 第五航空戦隊_珊瑚諸島沖に出撃せよ

data.name: 第五航空戦隊_珊瑚諸島沖に出撃せよ_Detail
data.value: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, Akigumo and up to 2 additional ships to World 5-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

data.value: Organize Ozawa's Fleet

data.name: 小沢艦隊_を編成せよ_Detail
data.value: Have Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou Kai, Chitose and Chiyoda (both as CVL), Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai in your main fleet

data.value: Sortie the Ozawa's fleet

data.name: 小沢艦隊_出撃せよ_Detail
data.value: Sortie Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou Kai, Chitose and Chiyoda (both as CVL), Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai to World 2-4 and score an S-rank victory at the boss

data.name: 新航空戦隊を編成せよ
data.value: Organize the New Carrier Division

data.name: 新航空戦隊を編成せよ_Detail
data.value: Have Zuikaku Kai Ni, Shoukaku Kai Ni and two Destroyers in your fleet.

data.name: 第三航空戦隊_を編成せよ_Detail

data.name: 精鋭_艦戦_隊の新編成
data.value: Organize the New Elite Fighter Force

data.name: 精鋭_艦戦_隊の新編成_Detail
data.value: Have Skilled Crew in your item page and Equip a rank 7 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 on Houshou set as your Secretary Ship, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 and a Type 96 Fighter. One Skilled Crew is consumed in the process.
